infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use the camera so you can take a profile photo.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We access your photo library to choose a profile photo.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We need permission to save your profile photo.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to track your run distance and pace.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We use your location to track your run distance and pace.
